summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5589 for the improvement of 5th Avenue Northeast, from East 85th Street to East 92nd Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73405, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
